StringListProperty.Name: DestinationFolders

StringProperty.Name: DestinationFileName
StringProperty.Description: File Name to copy the file to.

BoolProperty.Name: TreatOutputAsContent
BoolProperty.Description: Specify whether the destination file(s) are a deployable content.

StringProperty.Description: Content root folder to use for packaging.

DynamicEnumProperty.Description: Specifies the targets for 'Copy File' to run after. This is the same for all copied files in the project.

DynamicEnumProperty.Description: Specifies the targets for 'Copy File' to run before. This is the same for all copied files in the project.
